title: ~ [SKIN IDEA] Ravenborn Morgana ~
body:
Hey community!

Since I LOVE the work Riot did on Ravenborn LeBlanc (especially the part that it fits her very well!) I thought of who could expand the Ravenborn skin series and I came across Morgana. Then suddenly, I searched for a concept and voilà, I found one made by a nice guy on Twitter called Thomas Randby!
The picture is uploaded here and I'd like you to take a view on it, eventhough the most people would think: Oh a Morgana skin - not again! 
But it fits her veeeeery well and the guy did a really good job on this!

replies.body: I dig the idea of feathered wings, and I think the thematic works well for who Morgana is. I would be curious to see what she'd look like with a color other than purple, since that's what her base uses.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UHWkIH9E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-03T17:37:52.094+0000)
>
> I dig the idea of feathered wings, and I think the thematic works well for who Morgana is. I would be curious to see what she'd look like with a color other than purple, since that's what her base uses.

Thanks for the fast answer! I'm glad you noticed me and this wonderfully made skin! You are so right, it works well for her and especially her personality!  Plus, it has this mysterious vibe. (Gosh I am so hyped now >_<) The wings are really awesome and the outfit is simply stunning. Her white curly hair (first time on her, since she only has straight one in her other skins) fits perfectly. I can imagine wonderful green and (well, it's purple) purple particles, but I am so ready to see other colours of this skin line (since it's my favourite one!) Maybe her soil would dissolve into feathers after the duration expires? So many awesome possibilities! Tell me what you think about that! =)

I love the different hairstyle personally. I loved her Victorious hair, since it was put up, and totally different from what she normally has.

I'd be curious to see what green particles would look like. Ravenborn LeBlanc's particles look similar to Ghost Bride Morgana's, aside from color, so it'd be interesting to see something that's a different color than her base (so green), but different enough in shape language to keep them different enough from Ghost Bride. I think a good start would be the soil idea you had, where it dissolves into feathers.

Altering the color of her dress will be simple enough! Once the rendering's done I can just adjust the hue to make a bunch of different options! I love the idea of spooky green particles, sort of akin to the Shadow Isles theme

> [{quoted}](name=Hylia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UHWkIH9E,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-03T18:05:23.662+0000)
>
> Altering the color of her dress will be simple enough! Once the rendering's done I can just adjust the hue to make a bunch of different options! I love the idea of spooky green particles, sort of akin to the Shadow Isles theme

More like the Underworld Wukong skin... I think that would be nice.

> [{quoted}](name=Hylia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UHWkIH9E,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-03T18:05:23.662+0000)
>
> Once the rendering's done I can just adjust the hue to make a bunch of different options!

> I can just adjust the hue

> adjust the hue

> hue

:)
Eeee! I can't wait to see. :3
D: But green doesn't fit the Ravenborn theme, except if it's a very dark blue-ish green (something around #00371f or #15261e maybe). Black, purple and a dark blue are the Ravenborn colors.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UHWkIH9E,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-03T18:03:14.664+0000)
>
> I love the different hairstyle personally. I loved her Victorious hair, since it was put up, and totally different from what she normally has.
> 
> I'd be curious to see what green particles would look like. Ravenborn LeBlanc's particles look similar to Ghost Bride Morgana's, aside from color, so it'd be interesting to see something that's a different color than her base (so green), but different enough in shape language to keep them different enough from Ghost Bride. I think a good start would be the soil idea you had, where it dissolves into feathers.

Well the particles do look similar, but in my opinion the theme is totally different! For me, Ghost Bride expresses pain, sadness and loneliness, and the Ravenborn one displays mystery and darkness. Eventhough the particles are quite similar, the iconic attribute for the Ravenborn particles are the spectral-feathery look of them. How I said, the soil idea could work out very well, and I think it could be done very well with spectral like feathers. I've got other ideas aswell for her other particles. Especially the soundeffects on her spells (if there would be any, but I'd appreciate sounds like the one LB has (since they fit the mysterious theme). :) Overall, I think Ravenborn brings in also a little royal vibe, which is accentuated A LOT by Morgana's beautiful gown - which is also iconic for the fallen angel.

> [{quoted}](name=Elysian Astraea,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UHWkIH9E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-03T17:49:19.277+0000)
>
> Maybe her soil would dissolve into feathers after the duration expires? So many awesome possibilities! Tell me what you think about that! =)

I like this idea too.
10/10 summoner name xD
Product Manager likes the idea. Confirmation? °w°

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UHWkIH9E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-03T17:37:52.094+0000)
>
> I dig the idea of feathered wings, and I think the thematic works well for who Morgana is. I would be curious to see what she'd look like with a color other than purple, since that's what her base uses.

So is this skin comming or nah? 
:c i think it's a  awesome idea! and if you think the purple isnt a good idea why not make it white and the feathers too?? (because i feel like the purple needs black feathers to work, i dont want the dress to be green...) White feathers would be scary too and get the dress kinda lik reaper soraka colors. or a white dress?

also i feel like we dont see/ hear (lorewise) a lot about the angels in LoL (are you planning on expanding that like mount targon rework? add a ne angeltype champ?), we know we have Kayle and Morgana but Kayle in her fully angelic robes is different from Morgana in her almost turned dark- robes because Kayle is a warrior and Morgana a mage. 
SO What about a skin (not this one but like another concept) that shows Morgana if she hadnt taken the dark path but practiced good magic? White wings, maybe even an elo above her head etc i would look forward to seeing a ravenborn/ archangel Morgana skin!
Personally, I'd go with a deep red, or maroon. Ravens are carrion birds, after all.
Ahhh that's me!! Thanks so much, I'm so glad you like it! It's not quite done yet but it'll get there C: C: C:

> [{quoted}](name=Hylia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UHWkIH9E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-03T17:48:37.117+0000)
>
> Ahhh that's me!! Thanks so much, I'm so glad you like it! It's not quite done yet but it'll get there C: C: C:

W-wow! >_< It's an honor to have an answer from you to my post! :3 Yes, I LOVE this work, that's why I shared it here (I hope this is no problem for you) You are simply a wonderful artist and your other works are in my bookmark list! I thought this one fits her perfectly and since I love the skin line and theme, I decided to share your work! You are not done? Well it looks stunning until now! 
I am glad Riot noticed you (senpai!!) and in your case I would be so happy and thrilled to hear that from a professional!

More skins! More skins for all!

Raven born {{champion:114}} ples
idc if she already has night raven

YES RAVENBORN FIORA PLEASE. My plan was to make a whole all female skin line with Supp Morgana, ADC Vayne, Fiora Top to go with RB LeBlanc. I couldn't decide between Elise, Evelynn and Diana for the jungler

> [{quoted}](name=Hylia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UHWkIH9E,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-04-03T22:39:56.274+0000)
>
> YES RAVENBORN FIORA PLEASE. My plan was to make a whole all female skin line with Supp Morgana, ADC Vayne, Fiora Top to go with RB LeBlanc. I couldn't decide between Elise, Evelynn and Diana for the jungler

Can you actually read my mind? 
I just thought of asking you to do Ravenborn Evelynn. XD It would look awesome. She could wear a mask with long feathers.
You could go with Ravenborn Kalista aswell! :)

Ya definitely Evelynn. I don't know how you could make a Ravenborn Diana without it looking too much like Dark Valkyrie. And Ravenborn spider queen?..... No thanks. The mask idea on Evelynn sounds awesome too.
This skin would be really cool. I already have Blackthorn but would love to see how Riot uses this concept to make a skin.
Oh look, a skin where you can see her legs. I dig, lets get it put in there, Riot.
XD That speech though...
Goddamnit! I want that to be a thing, but then I'd have to choose between that one and Ghost Bride...and I REALLY like Ghost Bride.
Honestly this would be an awesome remodel of her base look. I've always loved how she plays, but hated her old/ragged drape wings and bad dress physics when she walks.
10/10 next harrowing skin
Any skin that doesn't make her wings look like shit is a ok in my book.
Now for a Kayle version of this theme plz :3

Skin idea: Ravenborn Swain.

Oh wait...
